subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Maharaja Mansingh I in Jaipur?
question_hi: महाराजा महानिवृत्ति मन्सिंगी के बनाई गई है।
explanation_en: Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort or Amber Fort, was built by Maharaja Mansingh I in the 16th century.
explanation_hi: महाराजा महानिवृत्ति मंसिंगी के 16वेंद्र में बना गया है।
